gobblin.commit

Interface SpeculativeAttemptAwareConstruct

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroHdfsDataWriter, FsDataWriter, HiveWritableHdfsDataWriter, PartitionedDataWriter, RetryWriter, SimpleDataWriter

    @Alpha
public interface SpeculativeAttemptAwareConstruct
    A declaration by any Gobblin construct to claim whether it is safe to have multiple speculative attempts. For example, if any DataWriter implements SpeculativeAttemptAwareConstruct and returns true in isSpeculativeAttemptSafe(), then multiple attempts of one DataWriter should not cause conflict among them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSpeculativeAttemptSafe() 

    • Method Detail

      • isSpeculativeAttemptSafe

        boolean isSpeculativeAttemptSafe()
        Returns:
        true if it is safe to have multiple speculative attempts; false, otherwise. To avoid inheritance issue, the suggested pattern would be "return this.class == MyClass.class".
